name: VR Horror Stories
summary: Horror movies, horror stories and paranormal activities have long fascinated people. "VR Horror Stories" is a passive horror experience that places viewers in dark, haunted environments where terrifying monsters, zombies, ghosts, or demons lurks around you. It features 23 short 360°/180° horror videos, totaling 64 minutes, each enhanced with spatial audio to help you locate surrounding threats before they close in on you. Experience a mix of atmospheric scares and narrative-driven stories, with...
